javadoc:
Panel for entering a file name that includes a title border, a text field
 for entering a filename, and a button for bringing up a file chooser dialog.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: propertyName
params.comment: the property name to save state

params.name: createBorder
params.comment: flag to create the border or not.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the listener.
@param listener the new listener
methods.name: setListener

methods.javadoc:
Sets the file filter.
@param filter the new file filter
methods.name: setFileFilter

methods.javadoc:
Adds a document listener to the text field.
@param dl the document listener to add.
methods.name: addDocumentListener
methods.comment: Adds a document listener to the text field.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the filename currently in the text field.
@return the filename currently in the text field
methods.name: getFileName
methods.comment: Returns the filename currently in the text field.

return.comment: the filename currently in the text field

methods.javadoc:
Sets the textfield with the given filename.
@param path the name of the file to put in the text field.
methods.name: setFileName
methods.comment: Sets the textfield with the given filename.

params.name: path
params.comment: the name of the file to put in the text field.

methods.javadoc: Sets the GhidraFileChooser to allow the user to just select files, just select directories, or select both files and directories. The default is GhidraFileChooserMode.FILES_ONLY. @param mode the type of files to be displayed @exception IllegalArgumentException if mode is an illegal Dialog mode
methods.name: setFileSelectionMode
methods.comment:
Sets the GhidraFileChooser to allow the user to just
 select files, just select
 directories, or select both files and directories.  The default is
 GhidraFileChooserMode.FILES_ONLY.

params.name: mode
params.comment: the type of files to be displayed

name: GhidraFileChooserPanel
comment:
Panel for entering a file name that includes a title border, a text field
 for entering a filename, and a button for bringing up a file chooser dialog.

fields.javadoc:
This mode denotes that only existing files will
 be chosen for the purpose of reading.
fields.name: INPUT_MODE
fields.comment:
This mode denotes that only existing files will
 be chosen for the purpose of reading.

fields.javadoc:
This mode denotes that existing files (or new files)
 will be chosen for the purpose of writing.
 If an existing file is selected the user will
 be prompted to confirm overwrite.
fields.name: OUTPUT_MODE
fields.comment:
This mode denotes that existing files (or new files)
 will be chosen for the purpose of writing.
 If an existing file is selected the user will
 be prompted to confirm overwrite.
